entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
